column4: hello. Does anyone know the command to reduce latency or to make it 0?
: Um, you cant just reduce latency with a command
yes Iv seen someone make their ping 0 by using a command in the console
: But that is impossible, and probably fake
yes I want to fake my ping
: Im sure that ping spoofing is program specific, because its application level not OS level
: No in fact I do not, google is your best bet
